scenarios.name: idle baseline
scenarios.interaction: Reset to configured timer and observe initial mobile layout.

scenarios.name: idle dial drag
scenarios.interaction: Drag dial clockwise by roughly one quarter turn while idle.

scenarios.name: start via card body tap
scenarios.interaction: Tap on non-control card header region to start timer.

scenarios.name: running steady
scenarios.interaction: Observe running state after first second tick.

scenarios.name: queue preset while running
scenarios.interaction: Tap preset chip during running to queue next brew.

scenarios.name: clear queued preset
scenarios.interaction: Tap same queued preset chip again to clear queue.

scenarios.name: tap dial while running
scenarios.interaction: Tap dial while running to check blocked-feedback behavior.

scenarios.name: extend while running
scenarios.interaction: Tap +1 minute while running.

scenarios.name: pause running timer
scenarios.interaction: Tap Pause control.

scenarios.name: extend while paused
scenarios.interaction: Tap +1 minute while paused.

scenarios.name: resume paused timer
scenarios.interaction: Tap Resume control.

scenarios.name: rapid double tap restart attempt
scenarios.interaction: Tap card body twice quickly while running to probe duplicate-action handling.

scenarios.name: disconnect state
scenarios.interaction: Tap demo Disconnect control while timer is active.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.stateBanner: Connection lost—trying to reconnect to Home Assistant…

secondaryCard.title: Office Break Timer
secondaryCard.emptyState: Add at least one preset to start brewing.

scenarios.name: reconnect state
scenarios.interaction: Reconnect and observe state restoration.

scenarios.name: entity unavailable
scenarios.interaction: Mark timer entity unavailable in demo controls.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.entityError: The timer entity timer.kitchen_tea is unavailable. Check that the helper exists and the entity_id is correct.

scenarios.name: recovered after unavailable
scenarios.interaction: Restore timer entity from unavailable state.

scenarios.name: missing entity configuration
scenarios.interaction: Remove entity from card config.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.entityError: This card isn’t set up yet. Add a timer entity in the card settings.

scenarios.name: wrong domain entity
scenarios.interaction: Set entity to non-timer domain.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.entityError: The configured entity sensor.demo_timer isn’t a timer (or doesn’t exist). Choose a timer.* entity.

scenarios.name: unknown timer entity
scenarios.interaction: Set timer id to unknown entity.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.entityError: The configured entity timer.demo_missing isn’t a timer (or doesn’t exist). Choose a timer.* entity.

scenarios.name: restored entity config
scenarios.interaction: Restore valid entity config after error scenarios.

scenarios.name: start service failure
scenarios.interaction: Fail next timer service call and attempt start via card tap.

mainCard.title: Kitchen Tea Timer
mainCard.stateBanner: Couldn't start the timer. Please try again.
mainCard.toast: Couldn't start the timer. Please try again.

scenarios.name: restart confirmation overlay
scenarios.interaction: Enable confirmRestart and tap card while running to open restart confirmation dialog.

scenarios.name: restart confirm canceled
scenarios.interaction: Cancel restart confirmation dialog.
